about_the_game:
--THE PRELUDE TO DOKI DOKI ANOMALY--

THE LAST SURVIVING MEMBER OF THE ORIGINAL TEAM OF RESEARCHERS STUDYING SCP-8008: THE NOVELTY GLASSES, A MYSTERIOUS PIECE OF EYEWEAR THAT ALLOWS THE USER TO FALL IN LOVE WITH LITERALLY ANYTHING.

RESIST COGNITOHAZARDS DURING YOUR WAKING AND DREAMING HOURS AND TRY TO SURVIVE SCP-173'S LOVE.
detailed_description:
--THE PRELUDE TO DOKI DOKI ANOMALY--

THE LAST SURVIVING MEMBER OF THE ORIGINAL TEAM OF RESEARCHERS STUDYING SCP-8008: THE NOVELTY GLASSES, A MYSTERIOUS PIECE OF EYEWEAR THAT ALLOWS THE USER TO FALL IN LOVE WITH LITERALLY ANYTHING.

RESIST COGNITOHAZARDS DURING YOUR WAKING AND DREAMING HOURS AND TRY TO SURVIVE SCP-173'S LOVE.
legal_notice: Doki Doki Anomaly is based on "SCP-173" by "Dr Gears": http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-173
name: SCP: Doki Doki Anomaly Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+ (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Any modern processor 1.1GHz and above, x64 architecture
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, 11 or 12 capable graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: SCP-8008-2 IS THE DEMO OF SCP-8008-1, A COGNITO-HAZARDOUS DATING SIM. Do not run the software without Class-4 Authorization. If you aren't sure why you're seeing this warning please contact your local authorities IMMEDIATELY.
